declineReasons.reason1: Not in adherence with Access Management Policy
declineReasons.reason2: Access can be granted to L3 or above only
declineReasons.reason4: This access does not need an Enigma request, please raise with your manager directly.
declineReasons.reason5: This request is breaking, please discuss with Security to fix and then re-raise if needed.
declineReasons.reason6: Reason supplied is either insufficient or incorrect. Please discuss with manager for a proper reason.
declineReasons.reason7: Access to this component is restricted, please discuss with your manager for next steps.
declineReasons.reason8: The request raised is incorrect or is not required for the reason supplied. Please re-raise with corrections.
declineReasons.reason9: Please raise this via Group Access. Get in touch with your Lead/Manager to get yourself added to relevant Access Groups.
